# plm

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of plm is to fix bugs based on plm package on the R-CRAN.

## Installation

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JiaxiangBU/plm")
```
